mapper.insert: insert into sys_patient (id, create_time, last_ip, name, password, phone, state, update_time, birthplace, family_address, contact_address, sex, medicare, eid) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lastIp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{birthplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{familyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{medicare,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eid,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: SELECT id, create_time, last_ip, name, password, phone, state, update_time, birthplace, family_address, contact_address, sex, medicare, eid from sys_patient WHERE id_card_num=#{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR phone=#{phone,jdbcType=jdbcType=BIGINT} WHERE
mapper.update: update sys_patient set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, last_ip = #{lastIp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=BIGINT}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, birthplace = #{birthplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, family_address = #{familyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_address = #{contactAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, medicare = #{medicare,jdbcType=INTEGER}, eid = #{eid,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, create_time, last_ip, name, password, phone, state, update_time, birthplace, family_address, contact_address, sex, medicare, eid from sys_patient where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, create_time, last_ip, name, password, phone, state, update_time, birthplace, family_address, contact_address, sex, medicare, eid from sys_patient WHERE medicare=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT};
